https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p6a5bA8rDA6g2da60jfDO4vAFjB.jpg Briar Bear, Bramble Bear & friends enjoy life in the woods when Logger Vick begins chopping down trees to get money to go home for the holidays. As Logger Vick is homesick, they hatch a plan to get Vick home in time for the holidays. Boonie Bears: Homeward Journey
